config.enable.name: Enable Mod
config.toggle-key.name: Toggle Key
config.show-invisible-monsters.name: Show Invisible Monsters
config.show-invisible-monsters.tooltip: Show health even if the monster is invulnerable, invisible, or not distinguishable such as a still Rock Crab.
config.hide-on-full-health.name: Hide on Full Health
config.hide-on-full-health.tooltip: Hide monster health if it's full. Health displays once you hit the monster.
config.show-health-above-monster.name: Show Health Above Monster
config.show-health-above-monster.tooltip: Show health above monster instead of below.
config.no-jumping.name: No Jumping
config.no-jumping.tooltip: If enabled, health display stays still for jumping monsters such as Dust Sprite.
config.offset-x.name: Offset X
config.offset-y.name: Offset Y
config.preview.name: Preview
config.show-max-health.name: Show Max Health
config.show-max-health.tooltip: Show max health next to current health.
config.fix-max-health.name: Fix Max Health
config.fix-max-health.tooltip: Some monsters have higher health than their maximum. Enabling this adjusts the displayed max health so it feels more natural. This option also affects percentage and health decay color.
config.show-percentage.name: Show Health as Percentage
config.show-percentage.tooltip: Shows percentage instead of absolute health. Overrides Show Max Health option.
config.font-size.name: Font Size
config.health-decay.name: Change Color as Health Decays
config.health-decay.tooltip: Change text color as health decays. You can still adjust the text color alpha value (recommended to leave at max) and background color.
config.health-decay-color.name: Health Decay Color
config.text-color.name: Text Color
config.background-enable.name: Enable Text Background
config.background-color.name: Background Color
